name: Alfred 2 Workflow for App Store
tagline: This Alfred Workflow is used for searching apps at iTunes or Mac App Store.
body:
![Screen Shot iTunes App Store](https://github.com/yisiqi/alfred2-workflow-appstore/blob/master/screenshot_app.png)
![Screen Shot iTunes App Store](https://github.com/yisiqi/alfred2-workflow-appstore/blob/master/screenshot_mas.png)
![Screen Shot iTunes App Store](https://github.com/yisiqi/alfred2-workflow-appstore/blob/master/screenshot_error.png)

### How to use

You can use it like this:

```
app angry birds
```
or
```
mas angry birds
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
